title: #1472 You're Never Alive For The Good Stuff
itunes:title: #1472 You're Never Alive For The Good Stuff
description:
Adam Ray returns for a final episode filling in for a traveling Dr. Drew and they open the show talking about the new season of 'American Crime Story' and some of the strange casting decisions that have to have the real life counterparts frustrated. They also talk about Adam Carolla's lack of geographic knowledge and how small the world seemed to him especially as a young person. They also discuss famous Chads and more.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
TommyJohn.com/ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
Pluto TV
